sql

Class MySQLConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • sql.MySQLConnection

  • public class MySQLConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains all the required information and methods required to establish a connection with Apache Ode's internal MySql database. Moreover, it contains methods for retrieving the result sets related to the two tables in use, ODE_EVENT and ODE_MESSAGE.

    • Constructor Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • MySQLConnection

        public MySQLConnection()

    • Method Detail

      • connectToDB

        public static void connectToDB()
                        throws java.sql.SQLException,
                               java.lang.ClassNotFoundException
        Method that connects to Apache ODE's internal MySQL database using the JDBC Driver.

        The server, schema and url variables are initialized according to the MySQL database configuration for the Apache Ode engine. However, if another schema configuration shall be used, the values of these variables have to be changed accordingly.

        Unless the same user and password are being used, these variables have to be changed according to the user and password defined when creating the database.

        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if cannot connect to database
        java.lang.ClassNotFoundException - if cannot find JDBC driver

      • getEventDataSet

        public static java.sql.ResultSet getEventDataSet()
                                          throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns the result set retrieved from the MySql database according to the defined query.

        In this case, it retrieves data from the EVENT_ID, DETAIL, SCOPE_ID, TSTAMP, TYPE, INSTANCE_ID and PROCESS_ID columns of ODE_EVENT table.

        Returns:
        the result set according to the query
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if cannot retrieve result set

      • getMessageDataSet

        public static java.sql.ResultSet getMessageDataSet(java.lang.String messageExchangeId)
                                            throws java.sql.SQLException
        Returns the result set retrieved from the MySql database according to the defined query. In this case, it retrieves data from the ODE_MESSAGE column of the ODE_MESSAGE table that matches the messageExchangeId extracted from column DETAIL of ODE_EVENT table by using the Event.getEventMessageExchangeId() method.

        Extra functionality Does not require commenting for the code to run without this functionality.

        Parameters:
        messageExchangeId - the message exchange id retrieved from the eventDetails
        Returns:
        the result set according to the query
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException - if cannot retrieve result set
